mapper.select: SELECT cart_no, member_no, p.products_no, mon_cnt, tue_cnt, wed_cnt, thu_cnt, fir_cnt, cd.reg_date, price, products_tag, products_name, system_name FROM cart_daily cd JOIN products p ON p.products_no = cd.products_no JOIN products_img pi ON p.products_no = pi.products_no WHERE origin_name NOT LIKE 'View%' and member_no = (select member_no from member where member_id = #{member_id }) ORDER BY cart_no
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM CART_DAILY WHERE member_no = (select member_no from member where member_id = #{member_id}) AND cart_no = #{cart_no}
